00036 #ifndef SeExprBuiltins_h
00037 #define SeExprBuiltins_h
00038 
00039 #include "SeExprFunc.h"
00040 #include "SePlatform.h"
00041 
00042 class SeVec3d;
00043 
00044 namespace SeExpr
00045 {
00046     void initPerlin();
00047 
00048     // trig
00049     inline double deg(double angle) { return angle * (180/M_PI); }
00050     inline double rad(double angle) { return angle * (M_PI/180); }
00051     inline double cosd(double x) { return cos(rad(x)); }
00052     inline double sind(double x) { return sin(rad(x)); }
00053     inline double tand(double x) { return tan(rad(x)); }
00054     inline double acosd(double x) { return deg(acos(x)); }
00055     inline double asind(double x) { return deg(asin(x)); }
00056     inline double atand(double x) { return deg(atan(x)); }
00057     inline double atan2d(double y, double x) { return deg(atan2(y,x)); }
00058 
00059     // clamping
00060     inline double clamp(double x, double lo, double hi) {
00061         return x < lo ? lo : x > hi ? hi : x;
00062     }
00063     inline double round(double x) { return x < 0 ? ceil(x-0.5) : floor(x+0.5); }
00064     inline double max(double x, double y) { return x > y ? x : y; }
00065     inline double min(double x, double y) { return x < y ? x : y; }
00066 
00067     // blending / remapping
00068     inline double invert(double x) { return 1-x; }
00069     double compress(double x, double lo, double hi);
00070     double expand(double x, double lo, double hi);
00071     double fit(double x, double a1, double b1, double a2, double b2);
00072     double gamma(double x, double g);
00073     double bias(double x, double b);
00074     double contrast(double x, double c);
00075     double boxstep(double x, double a);
00076     double linearstep(double x, double a, double b);
00077     double smoothstep(double x, double a, double b);
00078     double gaussstep(double x, double a, double b);
00079     double remap(double x, double s, double r, double f, int interp);
00080     double mix(double x, double y, double alpha);
00081     SeVec3d hsi(int n, const SeVec3d* args);
00082     SeVec3d midhsi(int n, const SeVec3d* args);
00083     SeVec3d rgbtohsl(const SeVec3d& rgb);
00084     SeVec3d hsltorgb(const SeVec3d& hsl);
00085 
00086     // noise
00087     double hash(int n, double* args);
00088     double noise(int n, const SeVec3d* args);
00089     double snoise(const SeVec3d& p);
00090     SeVec3d cnoise(const SeVec3d& p);
00091     SeVec3d vnoise(const SeVec3d& p);
00092     double turbulence(int n, const SeVec3d* args);
00093     SeVec3d vturbulence(int n, const SeVec3d* args);
00094     SeVec3d cturbulence(int n, const SeVec3d* args);
00095     double fbm(int n, const SeVec3d* args);
00096     SeVec3d vfbm(int n, const SeVec3d* args);
00097     SeVec3d cfbm(int n, const SeVec3d* args);
00098     double cellnoise(const SeVec3d& p);
00099     SeVec3d ccellnoise(const SeVec3d& p);
00100     double pnoise(const SeVec3d& p, const SeVec3d& period);
00101 
00102     // vectors
00103     double dist(double ax, double ay, double az, double bx, double by, double bz);
00104     double length(const SeVec3d& v);
00105     double hypot(double x, double y);
00106     double dot(const SeVec3d& a, const SeVec3d& b);
00107     SeVec3d norm(const SeVec3d& a);
00108     SeVec3d cross(const SeVec3d& a, const SeVec3d& b);
00109     double angle(const SeVec3d& a, const SeVec3d& b);
00110     SeVec3d ortho(const SeVec3d& a, const SeVec3d& b);

00113     // variations
00114     double cycle(double index, double loRange, double hiRange);
